Commands.Astral Fire: Fire BRV magic attack + HP attackSelf: 3 turns Astral Fire buffOverwrites Umbral Ice buff
Commands.Umbral Ice: Ice BRV magic attack + HP attackSelf: 3 turns Umbral Ice buffOverwrites Astral Fire buff

Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Astral Fire: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Astral Fire by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Umbral Ice: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Umbral Ice by 10%.

Passives.Astral Fire Charge: Increases the max uses of Astral Fire by 1.
Passives.Astral Fire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Astral Fire.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Umbral Ice Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Umbral Ice.
Passives.Umbral Ice Charge: Increases the max uses of Umbral Ice by 1.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.

Weapons.Anathema: Increases Astral Fire's potency and extends its duration.
Weapons.Stardust Rod: Increases Umbral Ice's potency and extends its duration.
